messages.title: Keep Scotland strong at Westminster
messages.content: Now, more than ever, we need a strong voice for Scotland - one truly committed to protecting us from unjust and immoral Tory policies.

mentions.partyLeader: Nicola Sturgeon MSP, First Minister of Scotland

endorsements.endorsement: Stewart has been a strong and effective champion for this constituency. He will continue to work hard for you and your community if re-elected on June 8th.

images.caption: Stewart McDonald has been an impartial voice in parliament.
Re-elect Stewart McDonald. A Strong Voice for Glasgow South.

leaflet.additionalNotes: A vote for the SNP on June 8th means we can continue to speak up for Scotland, and speak out against Tory cuts.
